treasuresFromGodsWord.description: A structured program for instruction, discussion, and practical application of Bible principles

segments.name: Talk
segments.description: Follows the theme and outline in the Life and Ministry Meeting Workbook
guidelines: When a new Bible book is introduced, a video may be shown
Speakers may connect the video to the theme but must cover all points outlined
Artwork and other references may be used to enhance understanding

segments.name: Spiritual Gems
segments.description: Question-and-answer segment to engage the audience and reinforce scriptural knowledge
guidelines: No introduction or conclusion is needed
Audience answers briefly (around 30 seconds)
Speaker decides if Bible verses should be read aloud

segments.name: Bible Reading
segments.description: Accurate and fluent reading of scripture
guidelines: Reading must be accurate and fluent
No introduction or conclusion
Proper pronunciation, stress, modulation, and natural pausing emphasized
Assignments should match students' abilities

segments.name: Apply Yourself to the Field Ministry
segments.description: Students practice ministry, including conversation, teaching, and preaching

subSegments.name: Starting a Conversation
guidelines: Assistant should be of the same gender or a family member
Focus on natural conversation and relevant Bible truths
Prepare for future discussions

subSegments.name: Following Up
subSegments.description: Demonstrate how to revisit previous conversations
guidelines: Assistant should match the student's gender
Focus on clarity, naturalness, and effective follow-up techniques

subSegments.name: Making Disciples
subSegments.description: Present a segment of an ongoing Bible study
guidelines: Introduction or conclusion unnecessary unless specified
Focus on conveying study material clearly
Model effective teaching methods

subSegments.name: Explaining Your Beliefs
subSegments.description: Handle talks on thematic questions or demonstrate belief explanations
guidelines: Provide tactful answers using reference material as needed
Assistants are of the same gender or family members

subSegments.name: Talk (Student Assignment)
subSegments.description: Present talks based on the Love People brochure
guidelines: Highlight how specific verses apply in ministry
Explain verse meaning, use, and reasoning approach
Focus on practical application

settings.name: Public Witnessing
settings.description: Preaching in public spaces such as streets, parks, or businesses

segments.name: Living as Christians
segments.description: Helps the audience apply Bible principles
guidelines: Begins after a song
Discussions encourage audience participation
Brief interviews, if needed, are preferably conducted from the stage

segments.name: Congregation Bible Study
segments.description: Ensures thorough review of assigned material
guidelines: Conductors selected for ability to preside, keep time, emphasize key scriptures, and highlight applications
Different conductors and readers may be used weekly
If time is limited, the chairman may direct abbreviation
Conductor determines which parts to omit while maintaining focus on essential points

treasuresFromGodsWord.conclusion: The meeting combines structured teaching, student participation, and practical ministry application, fostering understanding, communication skills, and effective application of biblical principles in daily life.
